——————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————— CLASS: GlobalExceptionMiddleware. USAGE:
Add at service configure method:
app.UseMiddleware<GlobalExceptionMiddleware>()
Before any other app.Use... commands.
Don't forget to assign exceptionResponseBuilder. ————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————

——————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————— TYPE: ExceptionResponseBuilder. TASK: Method delegate type for exception response builder.
ARGS:
context: HttpContext: Current request http context.
exception: Exception: Exception to respond. ————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————

—————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————— CTOR: GlobalExceptionMiddleware TASK: Constructs a GlobalExceptionMiddleware object.
This is called per request by the .Net Web API.
ARGS: nextMiddleWare : RequestDelegate : Next middleware delegate to invoke. ————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————————
